HomePage.title: Dictation activities built for real classrooms
HomePage.description: Plan focused dictation games, switch between practice modes, and give every learner clear pronunciation directly in the browser.

Features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to run focused practice
Features.sectionDescription: Dictation Masters keeps the spotlight on bilingual word lists, pronunciation, and engaging game loops—no vaporware dashboards.

dictationBuilder.title: Flexible dictation builder
dictationBuilder.description: Mix any source and target language, add instructions, and attach example sentences for every pair.

practiceModes.title: Multiple practice modes
practiceModes.description: Let learners switch between Writer, Quiz, Cards, and Archery games using the same word set.

instantAudio.title: Instant pronunciation
instantAudio.description: Built-in text-to-speech plays every prompt so students hear the dictation exactly as intended.

languageControls.title: Language direction controls
languageControls.description: Flip practice direction, shuffle word order, and decide when example sentences appear.

sharing.title: Shareable game links
sharing.description: Publish your dictations to the public gallery or keep private drafts for class use.

fastImport.title: Fast content import
fastImport.description: Upload CSV or TSV files or use AI-assisted generation to create word lists in seconds.

HowItWorks.sectionSubtitle: From idea to playable activity in minutes
HowItWorks.sectionDescription: Everything happens in the browser: build your list, tune the gameplay, and invite learners with a single link.

step1.title: Plan your dictation set
step1.description: Choose source and target languages, define instructions, and add word pairs manually or via upload.

step2.title: Tune the gameplay
step2.description: Pick default modes, hearts, timers, and example sentence settings so the activity matches your classroom flow.

step3.title: Share and start practicing
step3.description: Launch Writer, Quiz, Cards, or Archery mode immediately and share the link with learners or colleagues.

LatestGames.title: Latest Dictation Games
LatestGames.description: Check out the most recent public dictation games created by our community.
